NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
DAZ: Friends, who is the one who has illustrated this gorgeous mural of a jellyfish? I must offer my appreciation for this piece of work! DAZ: Friends, who is the one who has illustrated this gorgeous mural of a jellyfish? I must offer my appreciation for this piece of work! CAS: I am humbled to hear your praise, my friend... Oh, no. CAS: The waves have washed away the lower part of the mural yet again! CAS: I have already touched up this mural several times.. How frustrating.. Why are the waves on this planet so turbulent?! DAZ: Perhaps you should have the work moved to a safer place, my friend.. May I suggest.. MIT: Friends, a cyclone is fast approaching this island! CAS: I have prepared gravity crystals in the cove nearby to keep us anchored to the ground. Let us seek shelter within the cove before we continue this conversation!
2
1
CASSAVA: It is my pleasure, love. This invention will be truly incredible: I cannot wait to see you walking beyond the projection pool!
3
1
DAZ: Now, for the moment of truth... It is time to revolutionize projection technology!
4
3
CASSAVA: Daz? Did something happen? Your voyager has just disappeared..
5
4
CASSAVA: Daz, do you still read me? Daz..?
